overview:
Bruno VIALLEFONT is VDoc Softwaremarketing and communication Manager.

VDoc Software has produced the first business-oriented collaborative applications generator. This out-of-the-box solution called VDoc features all the modules (Business Process Management, electronic document management, Web content management, SDK, data universe, user interface, administration interface, etc.) required for designing and generating a genuine business solution. VDoc is therefore able to offer companies concrete responses to their needs for traceability, coordination, collaboration and sharing of information.
